mapper.select: SELECT warehouse_internal_code AS warehouseInternalCode, asset_stock_flag AS assetStockFlag, available_stock_flag AS availableStockFlag, actual_stock_flag AS actualStockFlag FROM warehouse_master ORDER BY warehouse_internal_code
mapper.update: UPDATE warehouse_master SET asset_stock_flag = #{assetStockFlag}, available_stock_flag = #{availableStockFlag}, actual_stock_flag = #{actualStockFlag} WHERE warehouse_internal_code = #{warehouseInternalCode}
